review: This product was a gift for my mother. She was very happy upon receiving it!!! She loves it!!! It's like having her on movie theater at home!
author: nyemia joseph

review: one of the bottoms on apple tv's remote control failed to work just after one month of occassional use...
author: Michelle

review: My family has all Apple devices, but we are Amazon prime members so I purchased the Amazon Fire TV first thinking it would better serve us.  Big mistake!  Not only was Apple Tv less expensive, but it's better HD viewing and the format is superior to Amazon.  While we will continue to be Amazon Prime members,  I would recommend the Apple TV over Amazon fire...especially if you have Apple devices.
author: Eric
